welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Colts Neck, known for its beautiful beaches and tranquil countryside. Get ready to immerse yourself in the local culture and explore all that our lovely city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport offers a comfortable and convenient experience for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport caters to the needs of private and corporate aircrafts.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Newark Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Newark Airport, primarily used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Newark Airport, primarily used by United Airlines.

wifi.note: Limited to 30 minutes per session. Upgrade options available for longer access.
